item.title: 数字支付竞争白热化，Klarna 将推出美元支持的稳定币
item.description: 瑞典金融科技公司 Klarna 周二表示，它将推出一种由美元支持的稳定币，成为监管机构加强对数字资产行业监管之际，最新一家深入数字资产领域的大型支付公司。【原文：Swedish fintech firm Klarna on Tuesday said it will launch a U.S. dollar-backed stablecoin, becoming the latest major payments company to move deeper into digital assets as regulators tighten oversight of the sector.】

item.title: 需求强劲，Abercrombie & Fitch上调年度利润预期
item.description: Abercrombie & Fitch 周二上调了年度利润预期，看好其 Hollister 连衣裙、牛仔裤和夹克的强劲需求，因为购物者会在节假日促销期间以更高的折扣抢购紧跟潮流的服装。【原文：Abercrombie & Fitch raised annual profit forecast on Tuesday, betting on strong demand for its Hollister dresses, jeans and jackets, as shoppers snap up in-trend apparel at deeper discounts during early holiday promotions.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士：俄罗斯正在权衡如何支撑负债 510 亿美元的俄罗斯铁路公司
item.description: 两位知情人士告诉路透社记者，俄罗斯政府正在讨论以不同方式扶持俄罗斯铁路公司，该公司是俄罗斯最大的商业雇主，已积累了 4 万亿卢布（约合 508 亿美元）的债务。【原文：Russia's government is discussing different ways to prop up Russian Railways, the country's biggest commercial employer, which has built up a 4 trillion rouble ($50.8 billion) debt pile, two people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 法国检察官对涉嫌销售非法商品的易趣网展开调查
item.description: 法国检察院周二表示，已对美国电子商务巨头 eBay 在其市场上销售非法商品的嫌疑展开调查，这证实了《巴黎人报》早些时候的报道。【原文：The French prosecutor's office on Tuesday said it had opened an investigation on U.S. E-commerce giant eBay on suspicion of the sale of illicit goods on its marketplace, confirming an earlier report from newspaper Le Parisien.】

item.title: 科尔百货今年第二次上调年度预期
item.description: 科尔百货公司（Kohl's）周二上调了其年度业绩预期，这已是该公司今年第二次上调业绩预期，因为该公司在应对高层变动的同时，还将依靠新的产品系列和跨品类促销活动来拉动节日期间的需求。【原文：Kohl's on Tuesday raised its annual forecasts for the second time this year, as the company banks on new collections and promotions across categories to drive demand during the holiday season while navigating top-level changes.】

item.title: 假日需求稳定，百思买上调年度销售预期
item.description: 电子产品零售商百思买（Best Buy）周二上调了年度销售额和利润预期，原因是节假日需求强劲，购物者会抓住大幅折扣的机会升级笔记本电脑、智能手机和其他家用电子产品。【原文：Electronics retailer Best Buy raised its annual sales and profit forecast on Tuesday, banking on strong holiday demand as shoppers seize steep discounts to upgrade their laptops, smartphones and other household electronics.】

item.title: 美国将缩小与其他国家的稀土差距
item.description: 全球数十亿美元的稀土项目将使美国在一定程度上摆脱中国稀土的控制，但对于大多数其他国家来说，这远远无法打破中国政府对稀土行业的控制。【原文：A multi-billion dollar pipeline of rare earth projects around the world is set to partly wean the U.S. off Chinese rare earths, but falls far short of breaking Beijing's grip over the sector for most other countries.】

item.title: 松下能源部门将从 2026 年起为亚马逊的 Zoox 供应汽车电池
item.description: 松下控股公司周二表示，根据一项多年期协议，日本松下能源公司将从2026年初开始向亚马逊的自动驾驶汽车部门Zoox供应圆柱形电池。【原文：Japan's Panasonic Energy will supply cylindrical batteries to Amazon's self-driving unit Zoox starting from early 2026 under a multi-year agreement, the Panasonic Holdings unit said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价消费者数据考验美联储的希望
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 声势大，市场小：Meta 的智能眼镜是这个假期的特色小玩意儿
item.description: 早期的技术采用者像吃感恩节火鸡一样狼吞虎咽地抢购智能眼镜，尤其是 Meta 公司新推出的在镜片上安装视觉显示屏的复古时尚版智能眼镜。但是，对价格、隐私和脸上戴着电脑的舒适度的担忧，让主流购物者在这个假期暂停了脚步。【原文：Early tech adopters are gobbling up smartglasses like Thanksgiving turkey - especially Meta's new, retro-chic version with a visual display in the lens. But concerns about price, privacy, and the comfort of wearing a computer on one's face are giving mainstream shoppers pause this holiday season.】

item.title: 美国对另外 15 种药物的医疗保险价格进行谈判，以检验节约成本的承诺
item.description: 美国政府预计将于本周公布其医疗保险（Medicare）医疗计划中 15 种成本最高的处方药的协商价格，这是特朗普政府致力于降低医疗成本的一个潜在信号。【原文：The U.S. government is expected this week to announce negotiated prices for 15 of the highest-cost prescription drugs under its Medicare health plan, a potential signal of the Trump administration's commitment to bring down healthcare costs.】

item.title: Netflix 以自行车骑行和产品突击活动为《怪奇物语》送行
item.description: Netflix 的热门科幻剧集《怪奇物语》（Stranger Things）即将迎来大结局，其市场营销和商品宣传力度堪比一部大片。【原文：Netflix's hit sci-fi series "Stranger Things" is about to ride to its conclusion with a marketing and merchandising blitz befitting a blockbuster movie.】

item.title: 美国政府关门导致感恩节航空旅行计划减少
item.description: 原本预计在感恩节期间乘坐飞机的美国人数将创下历史新高，但政府停摆 43 天，抑制了一年中最繁忙旅行季节之一的需求。【原文：A record number of Americans had been expected to fly during Thanksgiving, but a 43-day government shutdown dampened demand for one of the year's busiest travel seasons.】

item.title: 人工智能势头强劲，Alphabet 市值有望达到 4 万亿美元
item.description: 本周二，Alphabet 的市场估值有望达到历史性的 4 万亿美元，这主要得益于谷歌母公司对人工智能工具的重视，推动了长达一年的令人印象深刻的涨势。【原文：Alphabet was on track to hit a historic $4 trillion market valuation on Tuesday, powered by an impressive year-long rally fueled by the Google parent's sharpened focus on artificial intelligence tools.】

item.title: 投资者关注数据，美国期指走势趋缓，Alphabet大放异彩
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货走低，从上一交易日华尔街由科技股推动的反弹中降温，投资者在等待经济数据和财报，这些数据和财报可能会让人对美国消费者的恢复能力有所了解。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged lower on Tuesday, cooling from a tech-fueled rally on Wall Street in the previous session, as investors awaited economic data and earnings that could offer insight into the resilience of the American consumer.】

item.title: 中国蚂蚁金服集团季度利润同比增长 10.3
item.description: 路透社根据阿里巴巴集团控股公司周二发布的财报计算显示，在截至6月30日的三个月里，中国蚂蚁金服集团的净利润增长了10.3%，达到83.7亿元人民币（11.8亿美元）。 电子商务巨头蚂蚁金服提前一个季度报告利润。 两家公司均由中国亿万富翁马云共同创立，阿里巴巴持有蚂蚁金服 33% 的股份。【原文：China's Ant Group posted a 10.3% rise in net profit to 8.37 billion yuan ($1.18 billion) in the three months to June 30, according to Reuters calculations based on Alibaba Group Holdings' earnings released on Tuesday. The e-commerce giant reports profit from Ant one quarter in arrears. Both groups were co-founded by Chinese billionaire Jack Ma and Alibaba holds a 33% stake in Ant.】

item.title: 研究称，通胀拖累假日季前美国收入增长
item.description: 摩根大通研究所（JPMorgan Chase Institute）对银行账户数据的分析表明，通货膨胀已使收入增长倒退至与十多年前经济大衰退后缓慢复苏时相当的水平。【原文：Inflation has helped set back income growth to levels comparable to the slow recovery from the Great Recession more than a decade ago, according to an analysis of bank account data from the JPMorgan Chase Institute.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴季度收入超出预期
item.description: 中国电子商务巨头阿里巴巴周二公布的季度营收超过了分析师的预期，原因是对一小时送达服务的投资促使更多用户使用其购物应用程序，同时其云计算部门也实现了强劲增长。【原文：Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba , beat analysts' estimates for quarterly revenue on Tuesday, as investments in one-hour delivery helped drive more users to its shopping apps, while its cloud division reported strong growth.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度 Zetwerk 公司为明年首次公开募股申请聘请银行
item.description: 一位直接了解此事的消息人士周二告诉路透社，印度电子合同制造商 Zetwerk 已聘请了一批银行，并计划于 2026 年 3 月提交首次公开募股的草案文件。【原文：Indian electronics contract manufacturer Zetwerk has hired a slate of banks and plans to file draft papers for its initial public offering in March 2026, a source with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 台积电就安全问题对前高管提起诉讼
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co said on Tuesday it had filed a lawsuit in the Intellectual Property and Commercial Court against its former Senior Vice President Wei-Jen Lo, who recently joined Intel .】

item.title: 外交部官员称，法国要求对谢因停职三个月
item.description: 法国财政部官员周二表示，法国将于周三要求巴黎法官下令中国在线快时尚平台Shein在法国的业务暂停三个月。【原文：France will ask a Paris judge on Wednesday to order the suspension of Chinese online fast-fashion platform Shein in France for three months, a French finance ministry official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Meta 公司正在洽谈斥资数十亿美元购买谷歌芯片的事宜
item.description: 据 The Information 周一报道，Facebook 母公司 Meta 正在与 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌商讨从 2027 年起在其数据中心斥资数十亿美元使用谷歌的人工智能芯片，并在明年之前从谷歌云租用芯片。【原文：Facebook parent Meta is in discussions with Alphabet's Google to spend billions on using Google's AI chips in its data centers from 2027 and to rent chips from Google Cloud by next year, The Information reported on Monday.】

item.title: 欧盟的里贝拉说，欧洲数字规则手册不容谈判
item.description: 欧盟委员会副主席特雷莎-里贝拉（Teresa Ribera）在回应美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）的评论时说，欧洲的数字规则手册不容谈判。【原文：The European digital rule-book is not up for negotiation, European Commission Vice President Teresa Ribera said in response to comments made by U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick.】

item.title: 与 Uber Eats 和 DoorDash 达成具有里程碑意义的协议，澳大利亚外卖送餐员将获得最低工资
item.description: 在 Uber Eats 和 DoorDash 与该国运输工会达成协议后，澳大利亚送餐员有望获得最低工资水平，这被誉为世界首创。【原文：Australian food delivery workers are on course to gain minimum pay levels after Uber Eats and DoorDash struck a deal with the country's transport union that is being hailed as a world first.】

item.title: 报废费推高车价，俄罗斯汽车市场 2026 年前景黯淡
item.description: 经销商和专家表示，随着 2025 年即将结束，俄罗斯低迷的汽车市场已显示出微弱的复苏迹象，但随着报废费用的提高推动价格上涨，明年年初的汽车市场将创下近乎历史新低。【原文：Russia's depressed car market has shown weak signs of recovery as 2025 draws to an end, but is set to hit near-record lows early next year as higher scrappage fees drive up prices, dealers and experts say.】

item.title: 波兰反垄断监督机构就隐私政策调查苹果公司
item.description: 波兰反垄断局 UOKiK 周二表示，该局正在调查苹果公司是否通过其隐私政策限制了移动广告市场的竞争。【原文：Poland's anti-monopoly office UOKiK is investigating whether Apple is restricting competition in the mobile advertising market through its privacy policy, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国多米诺比萨首席执行官下台，战略转型初见成效
item.description: 英国多米诺比萨集团周二表示，其首席执行官安德鲁-雷尼（Andrew Rennie）已经卸任，将由首席运营官尼古拉-弗兰普顿（Nicola Frampton）临时接替。【原文：Britain's Domino's Pizza Group said on Tuesday that its CEO Andrew Rennie had stepped down, and would be replaced by Chief Operations Officer Nicola Frampton, on an interim basis.】

item.title: 英国易捷航空年度利润超预期，假期业务目标上调
item.description: 英国航空公司易捷航空周二公布的全年营业利润好于预期，并在提前完成之前的目标后，上调了假期业务的中期目标。【原文：British carrier easyJet reported better-than-expected full-year operating profit on Tuesday and upgraded its medium-term target for its holidays business after meeting the previous goal early.】

item.title: 台湾称 "不了解 "就美国芯片关税问题与韩国合作的情况
item.description: 台湾总理赵政泰周二表示，他 "没有任何信息 "显示台湾与韩国就美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收半导体关税一事进行了任何合作，并补充说台湾只与美国进行谈判。【原文：Taiwan Premier Cho Jung-tai said on Tuesday he had "no information" about any cooperation with South Korea on U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs on semiconductors, adding that Taiwan was conducting talks only with the United States.】

item.title: 报道称韩国执政党将根据关税协议提出美国投资法案
item.description: 据金融新闻社 Money Today 周二报道，韩国执政党民主党将于本周提出一项法案，根据一项削减韩国出口关税的协议，促进韩国在美国的投资。【原文：South Korea's ruling Democratic Party will propose a bill this week that would facilitate the country's investment in the U.S. under a deal that cuts tariffs on the country's exports, financial news service Money Today reported on Tuesday.】
